oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abyssinia Missionary Baptist Church, 2001 November 17
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Abyssinia Missionary Baptist Church. Formerly Twelfth Avenue Church of Christ, Abyssinia Missionary Baptist sits at 1810 Twelfth Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. The current Baptist congregation gained the church in 1971. The church's foundation is comprised of cut limestone. The exterior walls show a combination of red brick and sandstone. There is an asphalt shingle roof. Windows are 4/4 double hung. There are wood panel doors on the facade. Special features include painted glass windows and an organ inside. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Twelfth Avenue Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.); Abyssinia Missionary Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
